headline: DEXCOM INVESTIGATION INITIATED by Former Louisiana Attorney General: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC Investigates the Officers and Directors of DexCom, Inc. - DXCM
summary: Former Attorney General of Louisiana, Charles C. Foti, Jr., Esq., a partner at the law firm of Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC , announces that KSF has commenced an investigation into DexCom, Inc. .On July...

headline: 1 Reason to Sell DexCom Stock, and 1 Reason to Buy
summary: Shares of the medical-device maker DexCom (NASDAQ: DXCM) are down by 37% this year.  The diabetes-focused healthcare company disappointed investors with its second-quarter results, leading to a massive drop in its stock price overnight.  On the other hand, DexCom has attractive opportunities that could allow it to deliver market-beating returns to patient investors.
